p: One of the strengths of our study is that it describes a hard-to-reach population having never before been characterized in terms of risk profiles. We were able to enroll a large sample size, about the third of the total population of active PWID, likely being representative of the target population, given that the RDS assumptions were met [ 29]. Finally, we adopted a cluster analysis which is likely the most appropriate approach to define various profiles of a marginalized population [ 30]. Our study also showed different PWID profiles and the persistence of risk behaviors among some PWID.
